column1: Little Goat Diner////Never thought I'd write anything negative about one of my favourites
column2: and I will always love you Stephanie - for your non-pretentious culinary genius
column3: because I always see you walking around your restaurant/s like a mortal
column4: for always surprising me with something I've never tasted before
column5: for injecting a sense of true euphoria into the ritual of food with friends - so please don't be bummed if you (actually) read this review. Everyone has a bad day
column6: even those who are truly great.
